Additionals package¶

A package of common utilities used in different modules of the project.

Script decos.py¶

class additionals.decos.Log¶

logger decorator class

additionals.decos.log(func)¶

logger decorator func :param func: :return:

Script client_descriptor.py¶

additionals.client_descriptor.PortVerifier¶

alias of additionals.decos.Log.__call__.<locals>.save_to_log

additionals.client_descriptor.HostVerifier¶

alias of additionals.decos.Log.__call__.<locals>.save_to_log

Script server_descriptor.py¶

additionals.server_descriptor.PortVerifier¶

alias of additionals.decos.Log.__call__.<locals>.save_to_log

Script check_ip.py¶

additionals.check_ip.check_first_octet(data)¶

check first octet of ip address :param data: int :return: bool

additionals.check_ip.check_forth_octet(data)¶

check forth octet of ip address :param data: int :return: bool

additionals.check_ip.check_ip(ip)¶

check if ip address is correct :param ip: str ip address :return: bool, true if ip is correct

additionals.check_ip.check_second_third_octets(data)¶

check second and third octets of ip address :param data: int :return: bool

Script errors.py¶

class additionals.errors.IncorrectData¶
class additionals.errors.IncorrectType¶
class additionals.errors.IncorrectDataToDecode¶
class additionals.errors.ClientError¶

Script client_meta.py¶

class additionals.client_meta.ClientVerifier(name, bases, dict)¶

meta class to check child class methods

Script server_meta.py¶

class additionals.server_meta.ServerVerifier(name, bases, dict)¶

meta class to check child class methods

Script utils.py¶

additionals.utils. receive_msg (sender)

Function for receiving messages from remote computers. Accepts JSON messages, decodes the received message, and verifies that the dictionary is received.

additionals.utils. send_msg (sock, message)

Function for sending dictionaries via socket. Encodes the dictionary in JSON format and sends it via a socket.

Script settings.py¶

Contains different global variables of the project.

messenger
